Script Class References

Document version: 1.0

Author(s): Sven Gijsen

Date: July 2015

Introduction

This document summarizes the references to the default script classes of which you can make use of inside a custom BrainStim script.

Script Class References

 The following script classes are available by default:

Script Class Name Description
BrainStim Use this inside a custom script for accessing BrainStim functionality. There's only one BrainStim instance available under the name BrainStim in the script. You cannot construct more BrainStim class objects in the script
Archiver Use this class for creating, extracting and compressing files
QMLExtensions QML Plugin This is a QML plugin which is available after the "import BrainStim_QMLExtensions x.x" statement
BrainStimInterface Through this name you can access BrainStim functionality from within a QML file
OgreItem This custom QML item type can be used for creating a 3D scene
camera Use this OgreItem sub-type for creating/accessing a camera node
light Use this OgreItem sub-type for creating/accessing a light node
ExperimentManager Plugin This is the ExperimentManager plugin
ExperimentEngine This is the Experiment Engine
RetinotopyMapper This is a sub-class derived from the ExperimentEngine
QML2Viewer This is a sub-class derived from the ExperimentEngine
ExperimentStructure This is the main experiment structure
BlockStructure This class can describe a block inside a experiment structure
BlockParameterStructure This class can describe a block parameter of a block inside a experiment structure
LoopStructure This class can describe a loop inside a experiment structure
MethodStructure This class can describe a method
MethodParameterStructure This class can describe a parameter of a method
MethodConnectionStructure This class decribes a method connection
ObjectStructure This class describes a object inside a experiment structure
ExperimentTimer This is a custom timer script class
ImageProcessor You can make use of this script class for processing images
PrtFormatManager You can make use of this script class for editing prt files
RandomGenerator You can make use of this script class for generating random numbers and lists
TriggerTimer This is a custom timer script class that can trigger at specified intervals
